lead_paragraph: China’s plan to strengthen its claims over the islands has raised tensions with neighbors and the United States over freedom of navigation in the South China Sea.

byline.contributor: Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Washington, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

headline.print_headline: China’s Signal on Sea Bases: We’re Armed
headline.main: China Suggests It Has Placed Weapons on Disputed Spratly Islands in South China Sea
